content: Now that it's right before my eyes, I cannot rein it in anymore. <style=SizeBig>HMM! So very astonished.</style>

content: Now I can hang up my materials and finished hats outside. {A观察顶处}Come! The roof's woven nice and sturdy too. It should hold even if we get up there... I think, moo.

content: {A惊叹}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, I can't thank you enough! With the new walls and flooring, everything is exactly as I had imagined.

content: It must have taken a toll on you, to prepare all the materials for my new house...

content: So, I made this <style=Highlight>Caterpillar Fungus Herbal Remedy</style> especially for you. Back on the highland pastures where I grew up, it's a secret recipe the old herders used to stay strong and healthy.
